rev.comment: I don't think this needs capitalization, but please correct me if I am wrong

[[Image:Multitouch screen.svg|thumb|250px|Multi-touch screen]]
[[Image:Multitouch screen.svg|thumb|250px|Multi-touch screen]]
â
On [[touchscreen]] displays, Multi-Touch refers to the ability to simultaneously register three or more distinct positions of input touches.<ref>{{Cite web | title = What is Multitouch | url = http://solutions.3m.com/wps/portal/3M/en_US/TouchTopics/Home/Terminology/WhatIsMultitouch/ | accessdate = 30 May 2010}}</ref> It is often used to describe other, more limited implementations, like [[Gesture-Enhanced Single-Touch]] or Dual-Touch.
+
On [[touchscreen]] displays, multi-touch refers to the ability to simultaneously register three or more distinct positions of input touches.<ref>{{Cite web | title = What is Multitouch | url = http://solutions.3m.com/wps/portal/3M/en_US/TouchTopics/Home/Terminology/WhatIsMultitouch/ | accessdate = 30 May 2010}}</ref> It is often used to describe other, more limited implementations, like [[Gesture-Enhanced Single-Touch]] or Dual-Touch.
